desc.html: Visualisation of the (countable) field of algebraic numbers in the complex plane. Colours indicate degree of the polynomial the number is a root of (red = linear, i.e. the rationals, green = quadratic, blue = cubic, yellow = quartic...). Points becomes smaller as the integer polynomial coefficients become larger. View shows integers 0,1 and 2 at bottom right, +i near top.

wiki.Credit: I (Stephen J. Brooks (talk)) created this work entirely by myself.
wiki.Artist: Stephen J. Brooks (talk)
